sub_topic: Determining the edge connectivity of a graph.
message_1:
What is the edge connectivity of the below graph? 

    A---B---C   
    |   |   |
    D---E---F 

In other words, what is the minimum number of edges that need to be removed to disconnect the graph?
message_2:
The edge connectivity of the given graph is 2. 

To disconnect the graph, you can remove the following edges:
1. B-E and A-B (disconnects A from the rest of the graph)
or
2. B-E and B-C (disconnects C from the rest of the graph)

In both cases, you need to remove a minimum of 2 edges to disconnect the graph.
